amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for obligation or expenditure pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for obligation or expenditure pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 264 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
